/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows on the ground and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of this bustling city.
